mapper.sql: mswob.work_order_barcode_id, mswob.parent_id, mswob.barcode, mswob.work_order_id, mswob.work_order_code, mswob.barcode_status, mswob.label_category_id, mswob.remark, mswob.org_id, mswob.create_user_id, mswob.create_time, mswob.modified_user_id, mswob.modified_time, mswob.print_time, mswob.create_barcode_time, mswob.is_delete
mapper.select: SELECT br.barcode_rule as 'barcodeRule',br.barcode_rule_id as 'barcodeRuleId',lc.barcode_type as 'barcodeType',bl.label_code as 'labelCode', bl.label_name as 'labelName',bl.label_version as 'labelVersion',bl.print_mode as 'printMode',lm.once_print_count as 'oncePrintQty', lc.label_category_id as 'labelCategoryId' FROM mes_pm_work_order mpwo left join base_barcode_rule_set_det brs on brs.barcode_rule_set_id = mpwo.barcode_rule_set_id LEFT JOIN base_barcode_rule br ON brs.barcode_rule_id = br.barcode_rule_id LEFT JOIN base_label_material lm ON mpwo.material_id = lm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_label bl ON lm.label_id = bl.label_id LEFT JOIN base_label_category lc ON bl.label_category_id = lc.label_category_id AND bl.label_category_id = lc.label_category_id where mpwo.work_order_id = #{workOrderId} and br.barcode_rule_category_id = lc.label_category_id AND lc.label_category_code = #{code}

SELECT bl.label_code, bl.label_name, bl.label_version FROM base_label bl LEFT JOIN base_label_category blc ON bl.label_category_id = blc.label_category_id WHERE blc.label_category_code = #{labelCategoryCode}
select blc.label_category_name FROM base_label_category blc LEFT JOIN base_label bl ON bl.label_category_id = blc.label_category_id where bl.label_Name = #{labelName}

SELECT su.`password` FROM ocean_v2.sys_user_role sur LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.role_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON sur.user_id = su.user_id WHERE sr.role_code=015 AND su.user_code=#{userCode}
